Dialogue.Page: Welcome, stranger. I trust you have been enjoying yourself nicely at my settlement.
You must be here to request something of me?

DialogueOption.Text: Will you help us open the Great Door?
What can you tell me about the Fifth Shard?

Dialogue.Page: Do you mistake me for a fool?
I do not give away valuable information to strangers. You will have to look somewhere else for that information.
I know the following from a scroll I read: "Use the stone tainted with blood..."
I hope this assists you in some way.
I am sorry if you were relying on my cooperation, but you will get none here.
I am not prepared to give away my shard- my greatest source of political power on this planet- to a stranger.

DialogueOption.Text: But there could be lots of money behind the Great Door!
What if whatever is behind the Great Door is even more powerful than your shard?
That shard isn't going to help much when the other three clans want to help.

Dialogue.Page: The idea of the Great Door containing only wealth seems unlikely, but it is entirely possible...
If I controlled this planets eceonomy, I would control everyone. I would have complete control.
An interesting thought.
It only seems logical to use my shard to obtain something of even greater power.
You make a fair point. The other clans will naturally overpower any decision I try to make by having the majority.
I may eventually be forced to contribute my shard, whether I am in agreement or not.
I had not considered this possibility before. Perhaps there is reason to help open the Great Door.
But how do I know if you were sent here to deceive me?
Let us make a compromise, as I do not entirely trust you.
If you can prove your loyalty to me- to the Followers of Greed- I will give you my shard.

DialogueOption.Text: What do I need to do?

Dialogue.Page: The Followers of Greed have at least partial influence in every clan on this planet except for one: The Followers of Worship.
Their clan is heavily protected and is sheltered underground, making it very hard for my clan to do anything.
But, since the disappearance of their Sacred Shrubbery, they have let down their guard.
If you are able to gain entry to their sacred halls and bring me an item without being noticed, I may be able to use it to my advantage.
And you want my shard. This is the only compromise I am willing to make.
Do you agree to the terms?

DialogueOption.Text: I mean, I don't really have a choice.

Dialogue.Page: Then it is settled.
There is an issue, however. I can think of no item they own that would give me the influence I need.

DialogueOption.Text: Then what am I supposed to steal?

Dialogue.Page: Nothing, currently.
When an opportunity arises, I will have a job for you. Return here at a later date.
I still cannot think of what I would gain influence from.
We cannot steal something that is already lost, sadly.

DialogueOption.Text: I found It and gave It back to them.

Dialogue.Page: You what..?
Do you realize what you have done?!
Losing that shrubbery was the best thing that happened to this planet!
Oh, no... You have made a grave mistake, traveler.
The last time the Followers of Worship had their "sacred shrubbery", this world nearly fell under the complete control of the Order of the Shrubbery.
This is no longer a matter of simply stealing something. This is a matter of saving this solar system.
If we don't extract that shrubbery soon... what could happen is something to fear.

DialogueOption.Text: Is there anything I can do?

Dialogue.Page: Sneak back into the sacred halls of the Followers of Worship and steal the shrubbery.
Once you have escaped with it, bring it to me and place it on the table in front of me. I will handle it from there.
Good luck, traveler.
Did you run into a problem?

DialogueOption.Text: What am I supposed to do again?

Dialogue.Page: Is this it? Is this the shrubbery?
Amazing work! To be honest, I was partly expecting something more... sacred.
Place it on the table in front of me. I will take care of the rest.
Place it on the table in front of me. I will take care of the rest.
Is this it? Is this the shrubbery?
For a shrubbery of such high esteem, I am surprised at how it was stolen so easily!
I offer my congratulations! You have not only demonstrated proficiency in thievery, but courage too.
I am proud to help a traveler such as you. You have my word that I will join you at the Great Door and contribute my shard to the whole.
Is there anything you would like to ask me?

DialogueOption.Text: What's going to happen to the Followers of Worship?
What can you tell me about the Fifth Shard?
I'll see you at the door!

Dialogue.Page: I would imagine that, with their Sacred Shrubbery gone once again, they will go to the Great Door. It is not as if they have anything better to do.
Goodbye, traveler. It was a pleasure meeting you.
